page.title: 11 A THORLEY FAMILY
page.content: This family moved into Thorley recently.The father works in London.Their Manchester home had been sold so they needed accommodation quickly.They considered a Barbican flat close to his Fleet Street job but prefer a quieter enviromment away from the city.They picked up a leaflet bout Thorley houses at a Barbican exhibition,visited the area & found a new house in Abbots Way ready for immediate occupation.It is a typical Thorley house,brick built with a tiled roof,detached,with 4 bedrooms,bathroom, downstairs toilet,kitchen,through living/dining room & medium sized back garden.The drive-way is shared with the next house.There is only one garage so 1 of their 2 cars is parked outside at the front.
